content.question: Humidity is another environmental factor that affects transpiration rate. Using the axes provided, draw a curve that illustrates what you predict would be the rate of transpiration with increasing humidity and constant temperature. Justify the shape of the curve based on your prediction.

frqParts.text: Humidity is another environmental factor that affects transpiration rate. Justify the shape of the curve based on your prediction.

skill.text: 2.D: Represent relationships within biological models, including mathematical models, diagrams, flowcharts, and systems.
